# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #198](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#198)

#### Aethling

Where did humanity originate in the cosmere?

#### Brandon Sanderson

The first planet with humans on it was Yolen.
